org.drip.analytics.curve

Class DerivedFXForwardCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.FXForwardCurve
        • org.drip.analytics.curve.DerivedFXForwardCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve

    public class DerivedFXForwardCurve
extends FXForwardCurve
    This class contains the term structure of dates/times and FX forwards (PIP/outright), and Spot FX info for the given currency pair.

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer

      • DerivedFXForwardCurve

        public DerivedFXForwardCurve(CurrencyPair cp,
                     JulianDate dtSpot,
                     double dblFXSpot,
                     double[] adblDate,
                     double[] adblFXFwd,
                     boolean[] abIsPIP)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an FXCurve from the CurrencyPair, FX Spot, and the FX Forward parameters
        Parameters:
        cp - CurrencyPair
        dtSpot - Spot Date
        dblFXSpot - FX Spot Rate
        adblDate - Array of dates
        adblFXFwd - Array of FX Forwards
        abIsPIP - Array of PIP indicators
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Creates the FXCurve instance
